channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view

item.title: Version 1.108.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.24

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Context menu now successfully opens on items with 'href' set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix error on opening Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Fix hiding of popover due to re-rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DraftIndicator: JSDoc corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: fire data received event if request is aborted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#_getPropertyMetadata: fix for complex type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Fix grouping of Application filters in OperationMode.Server
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

item.title: Version 1.108.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.26

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Escape text value when creating tokens with validator

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.114.15 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.114.15

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

    • Type: FIX, Description: mTable: consider useFirstMatch on filtering existing items

item.description:
Changes in Version 1.114.16

item.title: Version 1.120.13 Changes

Changes in Version 1.120.13

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts

item.title: Version 1.121.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.1

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view

item.title: Version 1.124.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: New Assistant color added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix wrongly sized mid column
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Add new dependentOn option
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exception prevented in case of tabular suggestions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: The toolbar spacer is no longer hidden on phone
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Available items announcement improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent suggestions popover closing on Enter key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile: Remove the critical color on the text when the tile is in ActionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MaskInput: remove too descriptive label
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Badge is visible on tab with text and icon - inline mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Title font-size fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Fix left aligment in Tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider: Accessibility samples adjusments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is displayed correctly in Form
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image loading of Avatar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix footer buttons visibility when there is not enough space
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix popup rendering
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Fixed wrong icon names
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/UIComponent: Provide internal hook for router class definition
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/Version: fix type signature of `compareTo` method
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: getIdForLabel only on sap.ui.core.Control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.type.Unit/Currency#formatValue: document precedence of maxFractionDigits,scale and decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Index tree item scrolling tweak
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: ScrollToElement in ApiiRef master-side corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Samples default theme fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.HorizontalLayout: adding an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterField: copy Tokens as key/description pairs
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Reset via p13n/settings dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: name setters now work properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: update type info for uploadComplete event
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: ObjectPageLayout: Fix lazy loading of data of BlockBases
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/ui/core/format/TimezoneUtil#undefined] use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/date/TimezoneUtils} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nConditionPanel#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nFilterItem#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.filterbar.vh.FilterBar#undefined] Please use the <code>sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.FilterBar</code> control instead.
